tim.name: Project
tim.description: A collective effort with an objective related to biomedical research.

fields.name: identifier
fields.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

fields.name: label
fields.description: A human-readable name for the entity. [used in TIM for the short name of the project]

fields.name: title
fields.description: A name given to the resource. [used in TIM for the full title]

fields.name: hasCrossReference
fields.description: Reference to the entity in another electronic system.  The data stored about the entity may vary from system to system, but this relationship asserts that the reference represents the same entity.

fields.name: description
fields.description: An account of the resource.

fields.name: contributor
fields.description: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.

fields.name: hasPrincipalInvestigator
fields.description: A Principal Investigator associated with this entity.

fields.name: generated
fields.description: Generation is the completion of production of a new entity by an activity. This entity did not exist before generation and becomes available for usage after this generation.

tim.name: Donor
tim.description: An organism from which a sample or test result is available.

fields.name: identifier
fields.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

fields.name: label
fields.description: A human-readable name for the entity

fields.name: hasCrossReference
fields.description: Reference to the entity in another electronic system.  The data stored about the entity may vary from system to system, but this relationship asserts that the reference represents the same entity.

fields.name: hasDisease
fields.description: A property that identifies a disease or condition has been reported in this entity.

fields.name: hasOrganismType
fields.description: A reference to the organism type.

fields.name: hasRace
fields.description: A property that relects a HumanDonor's reported race.

fields.name: hasGenotypicSex
fields.description: A biological sex quality inhering in an individual based upon genotypic composition of sex chromosomes. [PATO]

fields.name: hasPhenotypicSex
fields.description: A reference to the BiologicalSex of the Donor organism.

fields.name: hasSexAssignedAtBirth
fields.description: A reference to the BiologicalSex assigned to the donor organism at birth by a medical professional.

fields.name: isPartOf
fields.description: A related resource in which the described resource is physically or logically included. {@en-US}

tim.name: BioSample
tim.description: Data about a physical sample consisting of one or more cells taken from an organism (living or deceased) or derived from such a Sample.

fields.name: identifier
fields.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

fields.name: label
fields.description: A human-readable name for the entity

fields.name: hasCrossReference
fields.description: Reference to the entity in another electronic system.  The data stored about the entity may vary from system to system, but this relationship asserts that the reference represents the same entity.

fields.name: hasDisease
fields.description: A property that identifies a disease or condition has been reported in this entity.

fields.name: hasDataCollected
fields.description: Date the BioSample was originally collected from its Donor.

fields.name: hasAnatomicalSite
fields.description: A reference to the site within the organism from which the BioSample was taken.

fields.name: hasDonor
fields.description: This property references the Donor organism from which the BioSample was acquired.

fields.name: isPartOf
fields.description: A related resource in which the described resource is physically or logically included. {@en-US}

tim.name: Dataset
tim.description: An extension of DCAT:Dataset to support Data Use Ontology terms. A collection of one or more entities submitted by a single responsible party or authorizing agent.

fields.name: identifier
fields.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

fields.name: label
fields.description: A human-readable name for the entity

fields.name: hasCrossReference
fields.description: Reference to the entity in another electronic system.  The data stored about the entity may vary from system to system, but this relationship asserts that the reference represents the same entity.

fields.name: title
fields.description: A name given to the resource.

fields.name: description
fields.description: An account of the resource.

fields.name: conformsTo
fields.description: An established standard to which the described resource conforms.

fields.name: contactPoint
fields.description: Relevant contact information for the catalogued resource. Use of vCard is recommended. {@en}

fields.name: hasOwner
fields.description: The entity responsible for making the item available and responsible for identifying authorized users of the Dataset or DataCollection.

fields.name: hasDataModality
fields.description: Data modality describes the biological nature of the information gathered as the result of an Activity, independent of the technology or methods used to produce the information.

fields.name: hasDataSnapshot
fields.description: An available distribution of the Dataset.

fields.name: hasPart
fields.description: A related resource that is included either physically or logically in the described resource. {@en-US}

fields.name: isPartOf
fields.description: A related resource in which the described resource is physically or logically included. {@en-US}
